attributes.action: changing places toilets in all new public buildings and shopping centres.
attributes.additional_details: There are lots of campaigns around this issue but nobody is listening so if it was made law they would!
attributes.background: I have two children with complex medical and physical needs also wheelchair users. They are unable to use normal disabled toilets as they need to be lifted out and changed on dirty floors which is not dignified for them and damages my back!

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling on Parliament to change the law, to require all new public buildings and shopping centres to have appropriate changing facilities for disabled children.
